stripped_text: Reduce the cost to install Jak Sinclair by 1 for each link you have. When your turn begins, you may make a run. You cannot use programs during this run.
text:
Reduce the cost to install Jak Sinclair by 1 for each [link] you have.
When your turn begins, you may make a run. You cannot use programs during this run.
title: Jak Sinclair
